roleset.name: take away funding

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: You are unwitting participants to the oldest Shock Doctrine trick in the book - defund popular social programs so that eventually they become dysfunctional and that 's used as an excuse to get rid of or privatize it .
example.arg: so that eventually they become dysfunctional and that 's used as an excuse to get rid of or privatize it

example.name: arg1
example.text: Progressives should be against de-funding and undermining of social security , in whatever form it takes .

roleset.note: DEFUND-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, comparison to 'fund'. No VNcls. (from defund.01-v)
DEFUNDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, defund.01. No VNcls. (from defunding.01-n)
